name: part_009
file: tmp_【#マリン出航3DLIVE】ゲストとワイワイ！Marine Set Sail!! Concert!!【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [vLGCYbnYhPg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Houshou Marine and Usada Pekora perform the song 'Hitorigoto'.
MC section where Marine and Pekora talk about the performance and their friendship.
Performance of 'Te o Tsunagou' featuring Marine, Korone, Noel, and Lamy.

subtitles.original: ...呑み込んだ
subtitles.english: ...swallowed.

subtitles.original: 「ごめんね」を吐き出すには　程遠い
subtitles.english: It's still far from being able to spit out "I'm sorry."

subtitles.original: ふとした時に探しているよ
subtitles.english: I find myself looking for you at unexpected times,

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔を探しているよ
subtitles.english: looking for your smile.

subtitles.original: 無意識の中
subtitles.english: Deep in my subconscious,

subtitles.original: その理由は　まだ言えないけど
subtitles.english: the reason for that, I still can't say.

subtitles.original: 独りでいると会いたくなるよ
subtitles.english: When I'm alone, I start wanting to see you.

subtitles.original: 誰といたって会いたくなるよ
subtitles.english: No matter who I'm with, I want to see you.

subtitles.original: たった一言　「ねぇ、どうして？」
subtitles.english: Just one word, "Hey, why?"

subtitles.original: 言えないこの言葉
subtitles.english: These words I can't say,

subtitles.original: 言えないこの気持ち　Ah
subtitles.english: these feelings I can't say, Ah.

subtitles.original: 早く気づいてほしいのに
subtitles.english: Even though I want you to notice soon.

subtitles.original: 1000ピースあるパズルみたいな選択肢と
subtitles.english: Choices like a 1,000-piece puzzle,

subtitles.original: 想像力が判断力の邪魔をしちゃう
subtitles.english: imagination gets in the way of judgment.

subtitles.original: 掴めない気持ちは今日も
subtitles.english: These elusive feelings, today too,

subtitles.original: 可愛くない顔見せて
subtitles.english: showing a face that isn't cute,

subtitles.original: 自己嫌悪プラス後悔で
subtitles.english: with self-loathing plus regret,

subtitles.original: 溜め込んだ「ごめんね」を吐き出すには　程遠い
subtitles.english: it's still far from being able to spit out those bottled-up "I'm sorry"s.

subtitles.original: 耳を澄ませば聞こえてくるよ
subtitles.english: If I listen closely, I can hear it,

subtitles.original: 君の声だけ聞こえてくるよ
subtitles.english: I can hear only your voice.

subtitles.original: 雑踏の中
subtitles.english: In the middle of the crowd,

subtitles.original: 気付かないふりしているけど
subtitles.english: I pretend not to notice,

subtitles.original: 隣にいると嬉しくなるよ
subtitles.english: when I'm next to you, I become happy.

subtitles.original: 遠くにいると寂しくなるよ
subtitles.english: When you're far away, I become lonely.

subtitles.original: 単純なこと　でもどうして？
subtitles.english: It's a simple thing, but why?

subtitles.original: 言えないこの言葉
subtitles.english: These words I can't say,

subtitles.original: 言えないこの気持ち　Ah
subtitles.english: these feelings I can't say, Ah.

subtitles.original: もっと素直になりたい
subtitles.english: I want to be more honest.

subtitles.original: 泣き出しそうな空模様
subtitles.english: The sky looks like it's about to start crying.

subtitles.original: 頬にひと粒　雨かな...
subtitles.english: A single drop on my cheek, is it rain...?

subtitles.original: 不安定な心隠した
subtitles.english: I've hidden my unstable heart,

subtitles.original: 独り言に全部隠した
subtitles.english: hidden it all in a soliloquy.

subtitles.original: 君のこと
subtitles.english: About you,

subtitles.original: 本当はずっと... Ah...
subtitles.english: actually, all along... Ah...

subtitles.original: ふとした時に探しているよ
subtitles.english: I find myself looking for you at unexpected times,

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔を探しているよ
subtitles.english: looking for your smile.

subtitles.original: 無意識の中
subtitles.english: Deep in my subconscious,

subtitles.original: その理由は　まだ言えないけど
subtitles.english: the reason for that, I still can't say.

subtitles.original: 独りでいると会いたくなるよ
subtitles.english: When I'm alone, I start wanting to see you.

subtitles.original: 誰といたって会いたくなるよ
subtitles.english: No matter who I'm with, I want to see you.

subtitles.original: たった一言　「ねぇ、どうして？」
subtitles.english: Just one word, "Hey, why?"

subtitles.original: 言えないこの言葉
subtitles.english: These words I can't say,

subtitles.original: 言えないこの気持ち　Ah
subtitles.english: these feelings I can't say, Ah.

subtitles.original: 早く気づいてほしいのに
subtitles.english: Even though I want you to notice soon.

subtitles.original: ぺこちゃん来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Peko-chan, thanks for coming!

subtitles.original: いえ、なんかすごい船ぺこね、ここね、なんか。
subtitles.english: No, this is quite a ship, peko. This place, somehow.

subtitles.original: そうなんですよ。乗せてやろうか、この船に。
subtitles.english: That's right. Shall I let you on board this ship?

subtitles.original: いや、もう降りるぺこ。
subtitles.english: No, I'm getting off now, peko.

subtitles.original: ちょ、待って待って。まだ早い。
subtitles.english: Wait, wait. It's too soon.

subtitles.original: お話しよう、お話しよう。
subtitles.english: Let's talk, let's talk.

subtitles.original: でも「独り言」っていう曲ね、ぺこちゃんが提案してくれたんだよね。
subtitles.english: But the song "Hitorigoto", Peko-chan, you were the one who suggested it, right?

subtitles.original: あれ、そうぺこっけ？
subtitles.english: Wait, was that so, peko?

subtitles.original: ぺこちゃん...忘れないで。
subtitles.english: Peko-chan... don't forget.

subtitles.original: でもぺこら思ったの。
subtitles.english: But Pekora thought...

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌って踊って、ぺこまりってエモくできるんだって。
subtitles.english: Singing and dancing together, Peko-Mari can actually be "emotional."

subtitles.original: なーにが「エモくできるんだって」だよ。なれるよ、いつだって。
subtitles.english: What do you mean "can be emotional"? We can be, anytime!

subtitles.original: ほら、今エモい、エモいうちら、エモいうちらの図。
subtitles.english: Look, right now, we're emotional. A shot of us being emotional.

subtitles.original: ねえ、愛想笑いやん。なんか微妙な顔して。
subtitles.english: Hey, that's a fake smile. You've got such a subtle face.

subtitles.original: 笑って笑って、はいチーズ。
subtitles.english: Smile, smile, say cheese!

subtitles.original: ねえ！嘘くさい！嘘くさいね、笑顔が！
subtitles.english: Hey! That's so fake! That's a fake smile!

subtitles.original: でもこの歌ね、ぺこらさんが二人で歌ってなったぺこだからさ。
subtitles.english: But this song, Pekora thought of it because we'd be singing as a duo, peko.

subtitles.original: 二人で歌える曲で何があるかなって思った時に、「この曲いいじゃん！」ってね、
subtitles.english: When I thought about what songs we could sing together, I thought "This song is good!"

subtitles.original: 「独り言」を提案したらマリンも乗っかってくれたから。
subtitles.english: and when I suggested "Hitorigoto," Marine hopped on board too.

subtitles.original: めっちゃ嬉しかったぺこ。
subtitles.english: I was super happy, peko.

subtitles.original: 今終わらせようとしてるでしょ。まだ終わらせないよ。
subtitles.english: You're trying to end it now, aren't you. I'm not letting it end yet.

subtitles.original: そろそろ時間だぺこ。
subtitles.english: It's about time, peko.

subtitles.original: もっと二人の尊い話とかして。
subtitles.english: Talk more about precious stories of us two.

subtitles.original: ぺこまりは真実！
subtitles.english: Peko-Mari is real!

subtitles.original: お別れだ。
subtitles.english: It's time for goodbye.

subtitles.original: てをつなごう　いっしょにわらおう
subtitles.english: Let's hold hands, let's laugh together.

subtitles.original: ともだちになろう
subtitles.english: Let's become friends.

subtitles.original: ぼくのみぎてときみのひだりてを
subtitles.english: If I try connecting my right hand and your left hand,

subtitles.original: つないでみたら　なんだかうれしくなったよ
subtitles.english: somehow, I started feeling happy.

subtitles.original: ぼくのみぎてときみのみぎてで
subtitles.english: If I shake hands with my right hand and your right hand,

subtitles.original: あくしゅをしたら　さみしくなくなったよ
subtitles.english: I stopped feeling lonely.
